tiled.plugins.lua
Class LuaMapWriter

java.lang.Object
  tiled.plugins.lua.LuaMapWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.FileFilter, MapWriter, PluggableMapIO
public class LuaMapWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapWriter

Exporter for writing maps to a Lua file. Loading maps in Lua could barely be easier!
